name: Porche
text: On Play: Don!!-1: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, you may add up to one card with the type [Foxy Pirates] to hand, place the remainder on the bottom of your deck, in any order. Then you may play up to one 4000 Power or lower purple character from hand.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, you may add up to one card with the type [Foxy Pirates] to hand, place the remainder on the bottom of your deck, in any order. Then you may play up to one 4000 Power or lower purple character from hand.
